Title: Iron Man
ScreenWriter: Mark Fergus & Hawk Ostby and Art Marcum & Matt Holloway
Cast: Robert Downey Jr., Gwyneth Paltrow, Terrence Howard, Jeff Bridges
Plot: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.
Filming Locations: Palmdale Regional Airport, Palmdale, California, USA

Title: The Incredible Hulk
Producer: Avi Arad, Gale Anne Hurd and Kevin Feige
Cast: Edward Norton, Liv Tyler, Tim Roth, William Hurt
Plot: Bruce Banner, a scientist on the run from the U.S. Government, must find a cure for the monster he turns into, whenever he loses his temper.
Filming Locations: Cherry Street Bridge, Toronto, Ontario, Canada

Title: Iron Man 2
Cast: Robert Downey Jr., Mickey Rourke, Gwyneth Paltrow, Don Cheadle
Plot: With the world now aware of his identity as Iron Man, Tony Stark must contend with both his declining health and a vengeful mad man with ties to his father's legacy.
Filming Locations: D.C. Stages, 1360 East 6th Street, Downtown, Los Angeles, California, USA

Title: Thor
ScreenWriter: Ashley Edward Miller & Zack Stentz and Don Payne
Cast: Chris Hemsworth, Anthony Hopkins, Natalie Portman, Tom Hiddleston
Plot: The powerful but arrogant god Thor (Chris Hemsworth) is cast out of Asgard to live amongst humans in Midgard (Earth), where he soon becomes one of their finest defenders.
Filming Locations: Galisteo, New Mexico, USA

Title: Captain America: The First Avenger
Cast: Chris Evans, Hugo Weaving, Samuel L. Jackson, Hayley Atwell
Plot: Steve Rogers, a rejected military soldier transforms into Captain America after taking a dose of a "Super-Soldier serum". But being Captain America comes at a price as he attempts to take down a war monger and a terrorist organization.
Filming Locations: Stanley Dock, Liverpool, Merseyside, England, UK

Title: The Avengers
Cast: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Scarlett Johansson, Jeremy Renner
Plot: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.
Filming Locations: Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, USA

Title: Iron Man 3
ScreenWriter: Christopher L. Yost and Christopher Markus & Stephen McFeely
Cast: Robert Downey Jr., Guy Pearce, Gwyneth Paltrow, Don Cheadle
Plot: When Tony Stark's world is torn apart by a formidable terrorist called the Mandarin, he starts an odyssey of rebuilding and retribution.
Filming Locations: Cary, North Carolina, USA

Title: Thor: The Dark World
Cast: Chris Hemsworth, Natalie Portman, Tom Hiddleston, Stellan SkarsgÃ¥rd
Plot: When Dr. Jane Foster (Natalie Portman) gets cursed with a powerful entity known as the Aether, Thor is heralded of the cosmic event known as the Convergence and the genocidal Dark Elves.
Filming Locations: Shepperton Studios, Shepperton, Surrey, England, UK

Title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
Cast: Chris Evans, Samuel L. Jackson, Scarlett Johansson, Robert Redford
Plot: As Steve Rogers struggles to embrace his role in the modern world, he teams up with a fellow Avenger and S.H.I.E.L.D agent, Black Widow, to battle a new threat from history: an assassin known as the Winter Soldier.
Filming Locations: Los Angeles, California, USA

Title: Guardians of the Galaxy
ScreenWriter: Edgar Wright & Joe Cornish and Adam McKay & Paul Rudd
Cast: Chris Pratt, Vin Diesel, Bradley Cooper, Zoe Saldana
Plot: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.
Filming Locations: Shepperton Studios, Shepperton, Surrey, England, UK

Title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
Cast: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth
Plot: When Tony Stark and Bruce Banner try to jump-start a dormant peacekeeping program called Ultron, things go horribly wrong and it's up to Earth's mightiest heroes to stop the villainous Ultron from enacting his terrible plan.
Filming Locations: Shepperton Studios, Shepperton, Surrey, England, UK

Title: Ant-Man
ScreenWriter: Jon Spaihts and Scott Derrickson & C. Robert Cargill
Cast: Paul Rudd, Michael Douglas, Corey Stoll, Evangeline Lilly
Plot: Armed with a super-suit with the astonishing ability to shrink in scale but increase in strength, cat burglar Scott Lang must embrace his inner hero and help his mentor, Dr. Hank Pym, plan and pull off a heist that will save the world.
Filming Locations: Pinewood Atlanta Studios, 461 Sandy Creek Road, Fayetteville, Georgia, USA

Title: Captain America: Civil War
Cast: Chris Evans, Robert Downey Jr., Scarlett Johansson, Sebastian Stan
Plot: Political involvement in the Avengers' affairs causes a rift between Captain America and Iron Man.
Language: English, German, Xhosa, Russian, Romanian, Hindi
Filming Locations: Atlanta, Georgia, USA

Title: Doctor Strange
Cast: Benedict Cumberbatch, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Rachel McAdams, Benedict Wong
Plot: While on a journey of physical and spiritual healing, a brilliant neurosurgeon is drawn into the world of the mystic arts.
Filming Locations: New York City, New York, USA

Title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
Cast: Chris Pratt, Zoe Saldana, Dave Bautista, Vin Diesel
Plot: The Guardians struggle to keep together as a team while dealing with their personal family issues, notably Star-Lord's encounter with his father the ambitious celestial being Ego.
Filming Locations: Atlanta, Georgia, USA

Title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
ScreenWriter: Eric Pearson and Craig Kyle & Christopher L. Yost
Cast: Tom Holland, Michael Keaton, Robert Downey Jr., Marisa Tomei
Plot: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City.
Filming Locations: Atlanta, Georgia, USA

Title: Thor: Ragnarok
Cast: Chris Hemsworth, Tom Hiddleston, Cate Blanchett, Mark Ruffalo
Plot: Thor (Chris Hemsworth) is imprisoned on the planet Sakaar, and must race against time to return to Asgard and stop RagnarÃ¶k, the destruction of his world, at the hands of the powerful and ruthless villain Hela (Cate Blanchett).
Filming Locations: Village Roadshow Studios, Oxenford, Queensland, Australia

Title: Black Panther
Cast: Chadwick Boseman, Michael B. Jordan, Lupita Nyong'o, Danai Gurira
Plot: T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future and must confront a challenger from his country's past.
Filming Locations: Pinewood Atlanta Studios, 461 Sandy Creek Road, Fayetteville, Georgia, USA

Title: Avengers: Infinity War
Cast: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Hemsworth, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Evans
Plot: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.
Filming Locations: Pinewood Atlanta Studios, 461 Sandy Creek Road, Fayetteville, Georgia, USA

Title: Ant-Man and the Wasp
ScreenWriter: Paul Rudd & Andrew Barrer & Gabriel Ferrari
Cast: Paul Rudd, Evangeline Lilly, Michael PeÃ±a, Walton Goggins
Plot: As Scott Lang balances being both a Super Hero and a father, Hope van Dyne and Dr. Hank Pym present an urgent new mission that finds the Ant-Man fighting alongside The Wasp to uncover secrets from their past.
Filming Locations: Atlanta, Georgia, USA

Title: Captain Marvel
ScreenWriter: Anna Boden & Ryan Fleck & Geneva Robertson-Dworet
Cast: Brie Larson, Samuel L. Jackson, Ben Mendelsohn, Jude Law
Plot: Carol Danvers becomes one of the universe's most powerful heroes when Earth is caught in the middle of a galactic war between two alien races.
Filming Locations: Los Angeles, California, USA

Title: Avengers: Endgame
Cast: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth
Plot: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to undo Thanos' actions and restore order to the universe.
Filming Locations: Atlanta,Georgia,USA

Title: Spider-Man: Far from Home
Cast: Tom Holland, Samuel L. Jackson, Jake Gyllenhaal
Plot: Following the events of Avengers: Endgame, Spider-Man must step up to take on new threats in a world that has changed forever.
Filming Locations: Hertfordshire, England, UK

Title: Black Widow
Cast: Scarlett Johansson, Florence Pugh, David Harbour, O-T Fagbenle, William Hurt, Ray Winstone, Rachel Weisz
Plot: At birth the Black Widow "aka Natasha Romanova" is given to the KGB, which grooms her to become its ultimate operative. When the U.S.S.R. breaks up, the government tries to kill her as the action moves to present-day New York, where she is a freelance operative

Title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
Cast: Michelle Yeoh, Awkwafina, Simu Liu
Plot: The movie, based on Marvel Comics, will focus on Shang-Chi; 'The Master of Kung-Fu'.

Title: Eternals
Cast: Gemma Chan, Angelina Jolie, Salma Hayek
Plot: Following the events of Avengers: Endgame (2019), an unexpected tragedy forces the Eternals, ancient aliens who have been living on Earth in secret for thousands of years, out of the shadows to reunite against mankind's most ancient enemy, the Deviants.

Title: Untitled Spider-Man: Far From Home sequel
Cast: Tom Holland, Zendaya, Benedict Cumberbatch
Plot: A continuation of Spider-Man Far From Home

Title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
Cast: Rachel McAdams, Benedict Cumberbatch, Elizabeth Olsen
Plot: After the events of Avengers: Endgame, Dr. Stephen Strange continues his research on the Time Stone. But an old friend turned enemy seeks to destroy every sorcerer on Earth, messing with Strange's plan and also causing him to unleash an unspeakable evil.

Title: Thor: Love and Thunder
ScreenWriter: Taika Waititi and Jennifer Kaytin Robinson
Cast: Chris Hemsworth, Natalie Portman, Taika Waititi, Christian Bale
Plot: The sequel to Thor: Ragnarok and the fourth movie in the Thor saga.

Title: Black Panther II
Cast: Danai Gurira
Plot: A sequel that will continue to explore the incomparable world of Wakanda and all the rich and varied characters introduced in the 2018 film.

Title: Captain Marvel 2
Cast: Brie Larson, Teyonah Parris, Iman Vellani
Plot: Sequel of the 2019 title 'Captain Marvel'.

Title: Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania
Genres: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Mystery, Sci-Fi, Thriller

Title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
Cast: Chris Pratt, Elizabeth Debicki, Karen Gillan, Zoe Saldana
